plot: Batman has been captured by the hazardous Harley Quinn. Chained and dangling over a tank of ravenous piranhas, how on Earth can the Dark Knight escape certain death?!
title: Batman Adventures: Mad Love
plot_es: Batman has been captured by the hazardous Harley Quinn. Chained and dangling over a tank of ravenous piranhas, how on Earth can the Dark Knight escape certain death?!
plot_en: Batman has been captured by the hazardous Harley Quinn. Chained and dangling over a tank of ravenous piranhas, how on Earth can the Dark Knight escape certain death?!
